channel.title: I need some help with my ancients
channel.description:
The server I'm developing has ancients, but when you use a spell on a moving target the spell doesn't stay with them, it only stays on the tile it formed. Also, I need a way of controlling the timing of the spell, so like the spell isnt cast [i]then[/i] you turn around and face the target [i]and then[/i] you do the little flailing thing. Now, I know that this happens because the player is always has integral tile coordinates, and stream or misc or something gives the player the continuous motion look. How would I make the spells streamable/whatever appear to be moving continuously?
Thanks.

item.title: I need some help with my ancients
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Ice barrage that holds people isnt that hard, just at a public int “frozen” to players, and add this

if(player.frozen==0){
absX=NewAbsX;
absY=NewAbsY;}
else{
player.frozen–;}

and make frozen = 200 times the number of seconds the player is froze.

Read full topic
